title: I bought some runes on 18/01
body:
Just wondering if it works like Skin sales n stuff, where I will be given the difference since theres a discount on runes now (30%).

It was only 2 Quints but thats like 600 IP there, if I knew about the sale I would of waited :(

replies.body: The announcement was made in advance, so you will not get refunded.  Sorry about that.
